channel.title: Teleport case numbers
channel.description:
I've been trying to fix this for over an hour, tried several different cases, and all of them gave me more than one teleport. (as in if I clicked 3 or 4 different teleports, it would teleport me to the same spot.)
I need the Lumbridge and Falador teleport case ids on the regular magics tab.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2009, 03:57:24 pm[/size][hr]I apologise for the double post. But, I really need to fix this problem. I'm using the JVM source, and all of my teleport spells on the regular magics tab are handled in clickingMost.Java
I've found out how to edit the teleports, but for some reason, when I call this case [code] case 6001: // Lumbridge c.triggerTele(3221, 3219, 0); break;[/code] to teleport you to lumbridge, it includes 3 teleport spells in it (Lumbridge, Falador, and Ardougne, meaning that if I click any of those, they all teleport me to the above coordinates.)
If it's any help at all, I have the Varrock teleport working, here's the code. [code]case 50235: //varrock c.triggerTele(3213+misc.random(3),3424+misc.random(3), 0); break;[/code]

item.title: Teleport case numbers
item.dc:creator: @Purely_Pink Purely Pink
item.description:
@Purely_Pink wrote:

I’ve been trying to fix this for over an hour, tried several different cases, and all of them gave me more than one teleport. (as in if I clicked 3 or 4 different teleports, it would teleport me to the same spot.)

I need the Lumbridge and Falador teleport case ids on the regular magics tab.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2009, 03:57:24 pm[/size][hr]I apologise for the double post. But, I really need to fix this problem. I’m using the JVM source, and all of my teleport spells on the regular magics tab are handled in clickingMost.Java

I’ve found out how to edit the teleports, but for some reason, when I call this case

case 6001: // Lumbridge c.triggerTele(3221, 3219, 0); break;
to teleport you to lumbridge, it includes 3 teleport spells in it (Lumbridge, Falador, and Ardougne, meaning that if I click any of those, they all teleport me to the above coordinates.)

If it’s any help at all, I have the Varrock teleport working, here’s the code.

case 50235: //varrock c.triggerTele(3213+misc.random(3),3424+misc.random(3), 0); break;

Read full topic
